scripts.doc: npm run typedoc -- --options typedoc.json --out ./doc/source ./src/ && apidoc -i src/ -o doc/api/ && ./scripts/deployDoc.sh --index doc
scripts.build: tsc -p ./src/ && mkdirp ./dist/public/tmp && tsc -p ./src/public/ && browserify ./dist/public/tmp/main.js -o ./dist/public/bundle.js && rimraf ./dist/public/tmp/  && cp -r ./src/public/src/static/ ./dist/public/
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.dev-launch: npm run rebuild && npm test && npm start
scripts.test: rimraf ./{src,test}/**/*.d.ts && istanbul cover _mocha ./test/**/*.js --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.postinstall: npm run burstmake && npm run typings && npm run build
